content:
Certainly! Here is an updated version of table T1 with the revised data and the added column for the number of gaming consoles:

Label: T1[3]

| Region | Number of smartphone users (in millions) | Number of PCs (in millions) | Number of gaming consoles (in millions) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| United States | 298 | 284.87 | 50 |
| Canada | 32.3 | 20 | 5 |
| Mexico | 132.4 | 40 | 10 |
| Europe | 474 | 308 | 100 |
| Australia | 31.9 | 10.29 | 3 |
| China | 1,040 | 300 | 15.9 |
| India | 829 | 247.3 | 15.9 |
| Pakistan | 186.9 | 45.13 | 50 |
| Africa | 495 | 450 | 186 |
